Title: Absolute Hundred
Writer: Srdan Golubovic, Biljana Maksic, Djordje Milosavljevic
Actors: Vuk Kostic, Srdjan 'Zika' Todorovic, Paulina Manov, Sasa Ali
Plot: Igor Gordic was an Olympic Champion in shooting, but now he is a junky without money and in debts to mafia. Sasa is his younger brother and he is getting ready for the next World ...
